document.full_text: rafa nadal and roger federer served up another treat in the 24th chapter of their great rivalry on saturday when nadal battled back from a set down to win 5-7 6-1 6-3 and secure a place in the madrid masters final.
document.title: nadal fights back to beat federer, djokovic next
lines_and_colors: rafa nadal and roger federer served up another treat in the 24th chapter of their great rivalry on saturday when nadal battled back from a set down to win 5-7 6-1 6-3 and secure a place in the madrid masters final.
